title: Number of elements in one list but not both

content.question: Which of the following can be used to assign the intended value to count ?

choices.label: bothList <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> Combine (list1, list2)uniqueList <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> RemoveAllDups (bothList)count <math alttext="←" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> LENGTH (bothList) - LENGTH (uniqueList)
